name: cheapest_tickets
description: Brings back the list of prices found by users during the most recent 48 hours according to the filters used.

origin.description: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code.

destination.description: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code.

period_type.description: The period for which the tickets have been found (the required parameter): year (default) — for the whole time, month — for a month.

beginning_of_period.description: The beginning of the period, within which the dates of departure fall (in the YYYY-MM-DD format). Must be specified if period_type is equal to a month.

sorting.description: The assorting of prices: price (default) — by the price. For the directions, only city - city assorting by the price is possible; route — by the popularity of a route; distance_unit_price — by the price for 1 km.

limit.description: The total number of records on a page. The maximum value - 1000. Default: 10.

currency.description: The airline ticket's currency. Default: RUB.

name: prices_calendar_month
description: Brings the prices for each day of a month, grouped together by the number of transfers, back.

origin.description: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code.

destination.description: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code.

month.description: The beginning of the month in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

currency.description: The airline ticket's currency. Default: RUB.

name: direction_prices
description: Brings the prices for the directions between the nearest to the target cities back.

origin.description: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code.

destination.description: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code.

depart_date.description: Day or month of departure (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

return_date.description: Day or month of return (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

limit.description: The number of variants entered, from 1 to 20. Where 1 (default) - is just the variant with the specified points of departure and the points of destination.

flexibility.description: Expansion of the range of dates upward or downward. The value may vary from 0 (default) to 7, where 0 shall show the variants for the dates specified, 7 – all the variants found for a week prior to the specified dates and a week after.

distance.description: The number of variants entered, from 1 to 20. Where 1 - is just the variant with the specified points of departure and the points of destination.

currency.description: The airline ticket's currency. Default: RUB.

name: prices_calendar_week
description: Brings the prices for the nearest dates to the target ones back.

origin.description: The point of departure. The IATA city code or the country code.

destination.description: The point of destination. The IATA city code or the country code.

depart_date.description: Day or month of departure (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

return_date.description: Day or month of return (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

currency.description: The airline ticket's currency. Default: RUB.

name: get_location_by_ip
description: The query is returned the IATA-code and the name of the nearest city from the user.

ip.description: Ip-addresses of the users (if the address is not passed, the system determines IP from the header of the request).

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
